name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior .NET Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly in compliance-heavy sectors like healthcare and finance. Proficient in **C#**, **.NET**, **ASP.NET MVC**, **ASP.NET Core**, **Entity Framework**, and **WebAPI**. Highly skilled in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular**, complemented by solid expertise in **OOP** and various database systems including **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle**. 

Adept at implementing modern software development practices with a strong emphasis on **NUnit** and mocking frameworks for robust testing. Demonstrated leadership and mentorship abilities guiding teams through the software development lifecycle while ensuring adherence to best practices and standards. Proven track record in building scalable, maintainable software solutions, focusing on user experience with insights from **CSS** and **SASS** for frontend development. Excels at blending technical and soft skills to deliver resilient architectures and drive projects to success.
